rows.text: Appropriate planning of personnel, equipment and timing including WHO-checklist
Clinical Evaluation, indication, consent and marking
Listens and communicates clearly, professionally, with respect
Ergonomics and visibility, positioning, including incision, and use of assistant
Dexterity, instrument and tissue handling, including suturing and knot tying
Demonstrates anatomy and tissue planes well
Appropriate post-op plans, including devices, documentation, and collaboration
